body.name: Evenflo GoTime No Back Booster Car Seat (Blue Astro)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 8 mins
features: ENABLE PROPER FIT FOR GROWING KIDS: Gives older children the extra boost they need for vehicle belt fit, and the included belt clip helps to properly position shoulder belt as your child grows
KEEP BEVERAGES HANDY: Offers 2 cup holders built into the seat to keep drinks and snacks close and allow the driver to stay focused on the road
ADD COMFORT TO LONG RIDES: Features contoured padding to keep your child comfortable during long road trips
KEEP IT LOOKING FRESH: Features a removable, durable seat pad that’s a breeze to wipe down, remove and clean
body.description: You want to keep your growing child seated securely. Your child, on the other hand, just wants to look cool. The perfect answer for both of you when it comes to a booster: the Evenflo GoTime No Back Booster Seat. Designed for older kids at least 4 years old and weighing 40 to 120 lb who can use an extra boost in the vehicle, this GoTime seat packs a multitude of thoughtful features into a stylish package. The included belt clip helps position the vehicle’s belt on the child’s shoulder to ensure proper fit. Dual-integrated cup holders keep snacks and drinks close at hand for your child, allowing you to stay focused on the road while driving. The contoured, padded seat keeps your child comfortable on long road trips, and is wipeable, removable and machine-washable for easy cleaning. Comes in a choice of fun colors and patterns to let your child’s individuality shine. GoTime No Back Booster Car Seats meet or exceed all applicable federal safety standards. If you need help installing your car seat, our ParentLink® customer service experts offer help online in real time. Get live video support with a certified car seat safety technician to assist with proper vehicle installation, so you can drive with confidence. It’s been 100 years and Evenflo continues to push the boundaries in baby and children’s gear design and innovation. We meet the needs of new generations of parents by focusing on what they really care about: leading-edge safety, smart design and technology, and convenient features that help them enjoy the journey of parenthood.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Read all instructions and warnings on the product, product labels, and instruction manuals before use. Consult your vehicle owner's manual to determine proper placement of child restraint in your vehicle and familiarize yourself with your vehicle's components.

productInformation.name: Additional product features
productInformation.value: ‎Parent Link Customer Service, Live Video Installation Support

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easiest seat to put in truck or car. Cup holders were a great thing to have. Great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for my grandson
reviews.reviewText: Well it was time to move my 5 yo grandson out of his toddler car seat. This is great because it's easy to install and remove as needed. Cup holders are a handy addition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Me gusto mucho pero el defecto que le encuentro es q con el movimiento del Niño se destraba la almohadilla de su lugar !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great in the car
reviews.reviewText: I have a Toyota Corolla and I have to have two car seats for the grandkids. This one fits really nice for my five-year-old granddaughter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the next set up
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this for the price. didn't look into the details of it so nothing matter much to me except for its safety (which I only purchase Evenflo). This is the absolutely BEST booster seats I have purchased (and I have 4 kids). It super easy to clean, light weight to move around, and the design is precious. If I even have to purchase another one it will be this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it and the cup holders!
reviews.reviewText: I have very few cup holders in my car, so the fact that this comes with 2 is amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe & easy to move
reviews.reviewText: Perfect to move from one car to another, but still safe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023

reviews.reviewText: The seat cover does not stay anchored into position and keeps coming undone. Other than that my son loves it.
